mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupsearch (writer, title, content, writeDate, startStudy, groupNo, tags, groupName) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE(), #{startStudy}, #{groupNo}, #{tags}, #{groupName})
